Welcome to Mamba Point Hotel

Home Away From Home

Mamba Point Hotel offers you a “Home from Home” friendly and comfortable experience with the best restaurants and facilities in Liberia located in the quiet diplomatic quarter in private grounds overlooking the Atlantic Ocean and only minutes from the city. Unwind, Relax and Energize in our recreational facilities including 3 Restaurants, Pool, Gym, Tennis Court, Spa and Casino.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”medium” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”none” url=”#” text=”Contact Us”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” bg_image=”56″ bg_position=”left top” bg_repeat=”no-repeat” scene_position=”center” text_color=”light” text_align=”left” bottom_padding=”40″ id=”overvew-sec” disable_element=”yes” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

[vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

The rooms at the Mamba Point Hotel are uniquely designed. We offer 60 individually temperature controlled guestrooms in a variety of sizes.
Amenities in each guestroom include private en-suite with hairdryer, bath or shower. All rooms are equipped with modern conveniences including satellite..[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]More Information[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”]

[vc_custom_heading text=”Large Conference Hall” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”]
[vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

The multi-functional event space can adapt to your wishes. Be it a classic seminar, a wedding reception or a press conference, the meeting room is as convertible and flexible as a conference stage. From 1 to 200 people.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]More Information[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”]
[vc_custom_heading text=”Barracuda Seafood and Sushi Bar” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”]
[vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

Barracuda Seafood and Sushi Bar is one of the two award-winning restaurants located on the first floor of the Mamba Point Hotel, with the view of the Ocean.
The restaurant’s interior consists of an interesting combination of modern design. The Barracuda Sushi Chefs create classic Japanese dishes from the freshest ingredients.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]More Information[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” bg_color=”#f1f1f1″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” top_padding=”50″ bottom_padding=”30″ disable_element=”yes” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text]

I would recommend Mamba Point Hotel to anyone visiting Monrovia. Their service is the best I have ever experienced at any hotel in general. Their... read moreI would recommend Mamba Point Hotel to anyone visiting Monrovia. Their service is the best I have ever experienced at any hotel in general. Their staff are very friendly and accommodating. Their cuisine is absolutely above average with excellent and friendly service. I look forward to spending even more days/nights during my next visit. read less

Asbirch

04 Jan, 2020

I have been coming back to Liberia for some years now, and for the most part, I choose to stay at Mamba Point. I am a sucker for Lebanese inspired... read moreI have been coming back to Liberia for some years now, and for the most part, I choose to stay at Mamba Point. I am a sucker for Lebanese inspired food and the view, so it is a good fit for me. The property and management have made quite some investment in the property over the years and it is better now than before to be sure. One great thing that they have done is to hire some Filipino staff. There is a young lady at the front desk (Yen?), one at the fairly new Sports Bar (Noby?), and a man at the coffee/bar point (Don). They are great and so professional! It was such a pleasure to have them on the staff and I enjoyed speaking with them everyday of my stay. Some of the Liberian staff are great too. I enjoyed talking to Arthur at breakfast, Quintus? up front, and the management team all seem to be doing the best they can and are engaging. What else do I like? - The proximity to business points in the city and nearby are good. - The property is clean, and seems relatively safe. - Food is good. What do I not like? - I tend to agree with more than a few reviews here, the price seems inflated for what is offered. I travel to other international places that are in developing countries, and you can get more for... I have been coming back to Liberia for some years now, and for the most part, I choose to stay at Mamba Point. I am a sucker for Lebanese inspired food and the view, so it is a good fit for me. The property and management have made quite some investment in the property over the years and it is better now than before to be sure. One great thing that they have done is to hire some Filipino staff. There is a young lady at the front desk (Yen?), one at the fairly new Sports Bar (Noby?), and a man at the coffee/bar point (Don). They are great and so professional! It was such a pleasure to have them on the staff and I enjoyed speaking with them everyday of my stay. Some of the Liberian staff are great too. I enjoyed talking to Arthur at breakfast, Quintus? up front, and the management team all seem to be doing the best they can and are engaging. What else do I like? - The proximity to business points in the city and nearby are good. - The property is clean, and seems relatively safe. - Food is good. What do I not like? - I tend to agree with more than a few reviews here, the price seems inflated for what is offered. I travel to other international places that are in developing countries, and you can get more for your money in these other countries. But it is Liberia, and competition is not as it is in other countries. - Some of the waiters/waitresses can be terribly disinterested and timeliness isn't a cultural value. In their defense though, some of the folks staying at Mamba Point act like royalty and are rude to the staff. I hate that. - At peak times, the wireless can be spotty in the evening. So I am content/happy for now and will be back :- ) More read less

TravelingTshake

04 Dec, 2019

I have been visiting Liberia for 8 years. This is by far the best place with an excellent and friendly service and a clearly above average cuisine.... read moreI have been visiting Liberia for 8 years. This is by far the best place with an excellent and friendly service and a clearly above average cuisine. All the space offers all aminities and as a pleasant ambiente read less

Juergen081255

01 Dec, 2019

The Mamba Point hotel has undergone an impressive facelift, with many nice new rooms, a gorgeous yard with a pool, and a really lovely re-do of the... read moreThe Mamba Point hotel has undergone an impressive facelift, with many nice new rooms, a gorgeous yard with a pool, and a really lovely re-do of the restaurants. It still remains an island of calm and hospitality, a wonderful home away from home, with friendly service and nice food (great sushi and Indian food!), all literally steps away from the ocean. read less

LesyaV2000

29 Nov, 2019

Mamba Point Hotel awaits your arrival and guarantees you a comfortable and relaxing stay with a choice of 59 of the largest and most up to date rooms in Liberia.

Our comfortable guest rooms and suites boast an elegant Scandinavian contemporary design with light wood furnishings, which creates a relaxing atmosphere and feature our Signature Mamba Point Hotel Easy Sleeper Beds to ensure a good night’s sleep.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][split_line_heading]

We decided to move

forward with building
